description: Fill, stack, ice, smooth, dot. Make appliqués, flowers, and berry sprays. Get ready to assemble everything for a gorgeous wedding cake! Amy shows you how to put it all together and provides detailed instructions on how to make it happen. We’ll learn to mount your chocolate appliqués (and get them to stay), crown your cake with your flowers and berries, and finish with artistic touches that will keep your cake amazing from all angles and all heights.
title: Cake Decorating:  Winter Anemone Wedding Cake
